d.f: `形容~`人~`目光~`敏銳~，`觀察~`入微~，`明白~`事理~。

francais: avoir la perspicacité de discerner les choses infimes
avoir une grande pénétrer toute chose
English: lit. seeing clearly the downy feather of autumn (idiom, from Mencius); fig. sensitive to the finest detail
to distinguish right and wrong with acuity
